LanguageData.RelicAtRitual.stages.at_ritual.label: {RELICNAME} at ritual
LanguageData.RelicAtRitual.stages.two_relics_at_ritua: Two relics were present during our ritual.
LanguageData.RelicAtRitual.stages.three_relics_at_rit: Three relics were present during our ritual.
LanguageData.RitualDelayed.stages.delayed.label: {RITUAL_labelCap} delayed
LanguageData.RitualDelayed.stages.delayed.description: {RITUAL_labelCapDef} has been delayed. We should have started it already.
LanguageData.TrialConvicted.stages.convicted.label: convicted
LanguageData.TrialConvicted.stages.convicted.descript: I was unjustly convicted of a terrible wrongdoing!
LanguageData.TrialExonerated.stages.exonerated.label: exonerated
LanguageData.TrialExonerated.stages.exonerated.descri: They had nothing on me, and I showed them!
LanguageData.TrialFailed.stages.failed_trial.label: failed trial
LanguageData.TrialFailed.stages.failed_trial.descript: I made an accusation and couldn't even make it stick. This is humiliating.
